Welcome to React Examples’s documentation!¶

class App.Collatz()¶
Collatz.constructor(props)¶

Create the Collatz component and pre-compute the Collatz sequence, which is stored as this.outputArr.

Arguments

  • props (object) – Object with number field used to begin the Collatz sequence.

Collatz.render()¶

Produce the div element with CSS class name Collatz. It includes a header and the Collatz sequence as an unordered list.

class App.App()¶
App.render()¶

Produce a div that contains within it some text on the left and the Collatz component on the right.

The number 17 as the start of the sequence is hard-coded in.
